data.actual_result: It doesn't, it will only resize when the scroll bar is almost at the bottom
data.expected_result: The scroll bar should resize to fit the 200+ text channels
data.short_description: The scroll bar goes back up when it reaches the bottom with 200+ text channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Restart Discord - Go to a server which has 200+ text channels - Scroll down and you will see the scroll bar go up and down when it reaches the bottom
